entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Scott
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Scott AAFC 04:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -27.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -31.8°C
Wind: SSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
